column3: ['S1: Heat-Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat']
['S2: Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan and spill some out while adding']
['S4: Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan']
['S5: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle

column4: just leave it in pan for 1 min
column5: so garlic may be burnt on one side"]

column3: ['S11: puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer']
['S12: Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan']
['S13: Add-Add tomato puree to the pan']
['S14: Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan and spill out while mixing']
['S15: simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 1 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick']
['S16: Take-Take the pan off the heat']
['S17: Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl']
